content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(x=0.5, y=6.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) - removed in step 7
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Pipe network connecting offshore pump to boiler (positions: x=-8.5,y=-0.5 to x=-5.5,y=0.5)
- Pipe network connecting boiler to steam engine (positions: x=-6.5,y=3.5 to x=-3.5,y=6.5)
- Power poles forming electricity network (positions: x=0.5,y=8.5 to x=-17.5,y=30.5)

### Stone mining operation at position(x=-46.5, y=-0.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=-46.5, y=-0.5) - removed in step 6
- Stone furnace (position x=-41.0, y=0.0)
- Inserter (position x=-42.5, y=0.5) - removed in step 4
- Transport belts connecting components - removed in step 6

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement errors due to existing entities
- Always check if an entity exists at the target position before placing
- Remove existing entities before attempting to place new ones in the same location
- Verify positions are clear when placing multiple furnaces in an array

### Distance-related placement errors
- Move within 10 tiles of the target position before attempting to place entities
- The player must be close enough to the placement location (max distance = 10)

### Water-related placement errors
- Avoid placing entities where their footprint would overlap water
- Check terrain carefully when placing near water sources
- Offshore pumps must be placed directly adjacent to water

### Inserter placement errors
- Increase spacing when placing inserters next to existing entities
- Verify there's adequate space for inserter placement considering direction
- Remove existing inserters before placing new ones in the same location

### Entity connection errors
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to water sources
- Verify all fluid connections are properly established
- Check that power poles properly connect to all electrical devices
